alert.note: Alert for Comanche (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 10:51PM CDT until June 15 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL COMANCHE...WEST CENTRAL GARVIN...SOUTHERN GRADY AND NORTHERN STEPHENS COUNTIES... At 1051 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Marlow, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Duncan, Marlow, Rush Springs, Bray, Central High, Acme, and Cox City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
